## LoadingInjection interface

loading 注入方法

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface LoadingInjection
```

## Properties

| Property                                                       | Modifiers | Type                                  | Description                                                                                                 |
| -------------------------------------------------------------- | --------- | ------------------------------------- | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| [addLoading](./vue.loadinginjection.addloading)             |           | (second?: number) =&gt; () =&gt; void | 添加 loading，返回取消当前 loading 实例的方法 传递等待时间 second，单位秒，默认 60s，等待时间达到后自动销毁 |
| [removeAllLoading](./vue.loadinginjection.removeallloading) |           | () =&gt; void                         | 强制销毁当前所有的 loading 实例，谨慎使用                                                                   |
